detaileddescription.para: A package for the R language which generates step plots, influence plots, coefficient-distribution-influence (CDI) plots, and influence metrics for linear models as described in the paper Bentley, N., Kendrick, T. H., Starr, P. J., & Breen, P. A. (2011). Influence plots and metrics: tools for better understanding fisheries catch-per-unit-effort standardisations. ICES Journal of Marine Science, 69: 84-88. doi:10.1093/icesjms/fsr174 (There is a pre-print, pre-review version here but the above link is recommended as it gives full access to the final version)

The package is still in development. A beta version is available under Downloads. Eventually influ will be submitted to the Comprehensive R Archive Network for direct installation via the install.packages R function.
We recommend looking at the influ vignette first. But if you don't have time for even that, here's an even quicker run down....
#Fit a glm model (the first term, in this case year, should be a factor!) myModel = glm(log(catch)~year+effort+month+area+depth+method,data=myData)

para.heading: Create an influence object for that model
Look at the summary data.frame and execute the various methods

detaileddescription.para: myInfl$summary myInfl$stanPlot() myInfl$stepPlot() myInfl$influPlot() myInfl$cdiPlot('month') myInfl$cdiPlotAll() ```
There is also a reference manual and if that fails you could always try the source code!
